title: Azir ult bug
body: Hi ! I was wondering if it was a bug or not ... but can Azir ult stop stop the sion ult (unstoppable onslaught) ? Because it just happened to me in a game and the sion ult description is that its not affected by crowd control ! So theoretically Azir ult should not stop the sion ult. Anyway thought you might want to know if it is actually a bug.

replies.body: That's working as intended. Azir's ult creates terrain temporarily and Sion's ult stops on collision with terrain.

While on topic of bugs this happened to Anivia yesterday: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PegdTGoM-ik

I posted it to boards but no one ever responded. Her passive didnt work at all

As above, Sion's ult is not truly unstoppable. The name of Sion's ult is a bit of a misnomer -- while being called "unstoppable", it does not actually give him unstoppable status, like Vi's and Malph's ults do.
